text:
@BrandonStraka Sadly, in all likelihood, their deaths were probably annotated with "covid" somewhere on the death certificate. Their deaths then added to the Johns Hopkins tally, which will keep the lockdowns going. They do the same with heart attacks, strokes, etc. 
https://t.co/bV89ZKJfs7

urls.title: 'Where are all our patients?': Covid phobia is keeping people with serious heart symptoms away from ERs
urls.description: The steep reduction in patients coming to the hospital with heart attacks, strokes, and appendicitis is puzzling, even shocking, to many clinicians.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
